titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, Currently at Bombay, to Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses the procurement of raw Ghilan [Gilan] silk for investment in Europe. Contains the following enclosures, whose subjects include the procurement of Ghilan silk and the varieties of cotton available on the Bushire market:A copy of a letter, dated 9 May 1812, from William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Bruce, Bombay.A copy of a letter, dated 6 November 1811, from the Court of Directors to the Governor in Council.A copy of a letter, dated 10 May 1812, from Bruce to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay.A copy of a letter, dated 25 May 1812, from Newnham to Bruce.A copy of a letter, dated 26 May 1812, from Bruce to Newnham.
